summary: middle east respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) is a virus that causes severe viral pneumonia in humans. it was first isolated in kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA) in 2012. after that, MERS-CoV exhibited outbreaks in several regions of the world. the bulk of publications in the field of MERS-CoV research are published by high-income countries such as the USA. the USA, the UK and KSA may have higher quality articles according to the value of h-index.
